encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: make adscript the iota in i.2; add accent to ἄκοντε in i.5; in i.7 ἔνθά τε > ἔνθα δέ; make adscript the iota in i.10; dot is on lambda not epsilon of ἕλοντο in i.12; add square brackets to |reg| in ii.9; remove |ed| markup in ii.16 and instead insert the comment “Apparently an error, but the same reading occurs here in Π20.”; change |ed| to scribal correction |subst| in iii.5; no square brackets around iota in iii.14; add dots to τὰ in iv.7; dot the φ in iv.8; remove |corr| markup in iv.9 and make added iota a subscript; change |corr| to |reg| in iv.11; put καὶ αὐτοὺς in square brackets in iv.11; change |ed| to |reg| in iv.14; 31 lines missing at top of col. 2; 33 lines missing at top of col. 3; 15 lines missing at top of col.4; ca. 22 lines missing at bottom of col. 4; make adscript all subscript iota in textual supplements as per ed.pr. META: change display name to P. Fay. 210; add pages to biblio 95468 (22-28); add number 10814 descr to biblio 95104; add number 210 to biblio 95143; move image hyperlink to online resources and add Aegyptus 91 (2011), p. 46 pl. 4 to printed images; mark provenance as uncertain and add Pleiades Georefs for Euhemereia (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736909) and Arsinoites (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736893) and TM Georef for Arsinoites (www.trismegistos.org/place/332)

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: make adscript the iota in i.2; add accent to ἄκοντε in i.5; in i.7 ἔνθά τε > ἔνθα δέ; make adscript the iota in i.10; dot is on lambda not epsilon of ἕλοντο in i.12; add square brackets to |reg| in ii.9; remove |ed| markup in ii.16 and instead insert the comment “Apparently an error, but the same reading occurs here in Π20.”; change |ed| to scribal correction |subst| in iii.5; no square brackets around iota in iii.14; add dots to τὰ in iv.7; dot the φ in iv.8; remove |corr| markup in iv.9 and make added iota a subscript; change |corr| to |reg| in iv.11; put καὶ αὐτοὺς in square brackets in iv.11; change |ed| to |reg| in iv.14; 31 lines missing at top of col. 2; 33 lines missing at top of col. 3; 15 lines missing at top of col.4; ca. 22 lines missing at bottom of col. 4; make adscript all subscript iota in textual supplements as per ed.pr. META: change display name to P. Fay. 210; add pages to biblio 95468 (22-28); add number 10814 descr to biblio 95104; add number 210 to biblio 95143; move image hyperlink to online resources and add Aegyptus 91 (2011), p. 46 pl. 4 to printed images; mark provenance as uncertain and add Pleiades Georefs for Euhemereia (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736909) and Arsinoites (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736893) and TM Georef for Arsinoites (www.trismegistos.org/place/332)
Submit - Entered text for Aegyptus 91 no.7 P. Fay. 210
Submit - Entered text for Aegyptus 91 no.7 P. Fay. 210
